intro.p: Base class for tests cases using the ASP.Net Runtime to run the web project

section.title: AbstractMRTestCase()
section.p: Initializes a new instance of the Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase class.

tr.td: Returns the sessionId related to the current session

section.title: GetVirtualDir() : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: GetPhysicalDir() : String
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: FixtureTerminate()
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: Terminate()
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: Initialize()
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: FixtureInitialize()
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: ReinstateRequest(Byte[] serializedRequest)
section.p: Reinstates the request.

section.title: GetSerializedRequest() : Byte[]
section.p: Gets the serialized request.

section.title: DoGet(String path, String[] queryStringParams)
section.p: Performs a GET operation on the specified path.

tr.td: The resource being request, for example home/index.rails
A list of key/value pair, for example name=johndoe

section.title: DoGet(String path, Boolean resendCookies, String[] queryStringParams)
section.p: Performs a GET operation on the specified path.

tr.td: The resource being request, for example home/index.rails
A list of key/value pair, for example name=johndoe

section.title: DoPost(String path, String[] postStringParams)
section.p: Performs a POST operation on the specified path.

tr.td: The resource being request, for example home/index.rails
A list of key/value pair, for example name=johndoe

section.title: DoPost(String path, Boolean resendCookies, String[] postStringParams)
section.p: Performs a POST operation on the specified path.

tr.td: The resource being request, for example home/index.rails
A list of key/value pair, for example name=johndoe

section.title: DoHead(String path, String[] postStringParams)
section.p: Performs a HEAD operation on the specified path.

tr.td: The resource being request, for example home/index.rails
A list of key/value pair, for example name=johndoe

section.title: AssertResponseNodeCount(String xpathExpression, Int32 numberOfExpectedNodes)
section.p: Asserts that the response contains a number of nodes matching an XPath expression.

tr.td: The xpath expression to match against.

section.title: AssertNotRedirectedTo(String url)
section.p: Asserts that the response was NOT a redirect to the specified url - for example check that your request was not sent to a login screen.

section.title: AssertStatusCode(Int32 expectedCode)
section.p: Missing summary

section.title: AssertSuccess()
section.p: Asserts the return status code is less than 400

section.title: AssertReplyEqualTo(String expectedContents)
section.p: Asserts that reply has exactly the samme content of expectedContents

section.title: AssertReplyStartsWith(String contents)
section.p: Asserts that reply starts with expectedContents

section.title: AssertReplyEndsWith(String contents)
section.p: Asserts that reply ends with expectedContents

section.title: AssertReplyContains(String contents)
section.p: Asserts that reply contains the specified expectedContents

section.title: AssertReplyIsBlank()
section.p: Asserts that reply have only whitespace characters

section.title: AssertReplyMatch(String pattern)
section.p: Asserts that reply contents match the specified pattern, ignoring any whitespaces pattern

section.title: AssertReplyMatch(String pattern, Boolean ignoreSpaces)
section.p: Asserts that reply contents match the specified pattern pattern

section.title: AssertReplyMatch(String pattern, Boolean ignoreSpaces, RegexOptions options)
section.p: Asserts that reply contents match the specified pattern pattern

section.title: AssertReplyDoesNotContain(String contents)
section.p: Asserts that reply does not contain expectedContents

section.title: AssertRedirectedTo(String url)
section.p: Asserts that the response was a redirect to the specified url

section.title: AssertContentTypeEqualsTo(String expectedContentType)
section.p: Asserts that the content-type header is equals to the specified value

section.title: AssertContentTypeStartsWith(String expectedContentType)
section.p: Asserts that the content-type header starts with to the specified value

section.title: AssertContentTypeEndsWith(String expectedContentType)
section.p: Asserts that the content-type header ends with the specified value

section.title: AssertHasHeader(String headerName)
section.p: Asserts that response contains the specified header.

section.title: AssertPropertyBagContains(String entryKey)
section.p: Asserts that PropertyBag contains the specified key.

section.title: AssertPropertyBagEntryEquals(String entryKey, Object expectedValue)
section.p: Asserts that PropertyBag's entry value equals to the specified value.

section.title: AssertFlashContains(String entryKey)
section.p: Asserts that Flash contains the specified key.

section.title: AssertFlashDoesNotContain(String entryKey)
section.p: Asserts that Flash does not contains the specified key.

section.title: AssertFlashEntryEquals(String entryKey, Object expectedValue)
section.p: Asserts that Flash's entry value equals to the specified value.

section.title: AssertSessionContains(String entryKey)
section.p: Asserts that Session contains the specified key.

section.title: AssertSessionDoesNotContain(String entryKey)
section.p: Asserts that Session does not contains the specified key.

section.title: AssertSessionEntryEqualsTo(String entryKey, Object expectedValue)
section.p: Asserts that Session's entry value equals to the specified value.

section.title: AssertHasCookie(String cookieName)
section.p: Asserts that the response contains the specified cookie.

section.title: AssertCookieValueEqualsTo(String cookieName, String expectedValue)
section.p: Asserts that Response cookie entry value equals to the specified value.

section.title: AssertCookieExpirationEqualsTo(String cookieName, DateTime expectedExpiration)
section.p: Asserts that the response cookie has the specified expiration.
